ing: 1 pound fresh green beans, trimmed and snapped
des: "These soft green beans are a great side to any meal."
ins: Heat oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Cook and stir garlic until lightly browned. Mix in green beans and water, and bring to a boil. Stir in allspice, salt, and pepper. Cover, and simmer 20 minutes, until green beans are soft.
